title: uidiDavE krpai
sahitya:
uidiDavE krpai sheidiDuvAyE ayyanE panniru kaiyanE aDiyEn


anupallavi

  vaiyaga vAzhvenadai vadaikkum Uzhvinaiyai koidu pErinbamadai eidiDumArenna


caraNam    cennai mAnagaram tannilE tigazh ninra manrattE pugazhoDu magizhum enran murugA
unnaiyanri enakku urutuNai yAvOrillai vanna mayil vAhanA SaNmukha mOhanA
